messages:
Name: Ricardo Esgaio
Nationality: Portugal
Date of Birth: May 16, 1993
Position: Defender
Current club: Sporting Braga
Primeira Liga clubs played for: Sporting CP, Académica, Sporting Braga

Ricardo Esgaio, the Sporting Braga defender, has appeared in the vast majority of their Primeira Liga matches in 2020/2021, making 32 appearances overall and playing 2,871 minutes. He has been selected in the starting XI in all 32 of these appearances across their 34 fixtures.

Esgaio last made an appearance in a competition game on May 14, playing 90 minutes for Sporting Braga against Moreirense in a 2-1 success. In total, he has scored one Primeira Liga goal this term, and chipped in with three assists. He has amassed six yellow cards.
He opened his account for the campaign against Vitória Guimarães on October 25, scoring during a 1-0 victory.
Last season for Sporting Braga, Esgaio made 30 Primeira Liga appearances, scored one goal and provided five assists.
Esgaio switched to Sporting Braga in July 2017 from Sporting CP II, for whom he made 13 league appearances in total, scoring one goal.
